• Lounger Choco brown bean bag is very attractive and luxurious in appearance.
  • A lot of comforts will also be found in this bean bag.
  • This Lounger bean bag is for the children and also for the elders.
  • Giving you a great choice of luxury Bean Bags to perfectly suit your lifestyle & living space.
  • This comfy bean bag is the perfect furniture addition to any basement, family room, dorm, or bedroom whether as a gaming chair or a study spot
